title: (x) UNICEF Australia's 2005 Annual Report - Univers, Myriad {Rainer}
content:
Hi everyone,  
Can someone help me out by identifying the typeface used in UNICEF Australia’s 2005 Annual Report at [http://www.unicef.org.au/WhoWeAre-Subs.asp?WhoWeAreID=10](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120053338/http:/www.unicef.org.au/WhoWeAre-Subs.asp?WhoWeAreID=10) (download in bottom right hand corner of page)? It’s so similar to so many fonts…

Cheers!
author: the_wellspring

comments.content:
[Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120053338/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=LH.121025.0.0) and [Myriad](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120053338/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories=1&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=myriad).

FYI: If you have an PDF, check Ctrl+D/Apple+D for the embedded typefaces. Easy one.
Huzzah! Thanks (for the answer and the tip)!
